Reviews.Title: An upgrade on the KP500
Reviews.Author: Mr Blister "Mr. S"
Reviews.Content: The LG GS500 is similar in design to the KP500, but works with 3G which is good for all of us who download a lot. Plus the port for headphones is now just a standard 3.5mm jack, so you can use your regular headphones instead of needing the LG version..

Reviews.Title: okay phone for the price
Reviews.Author: katenrose
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because I didn't want to have to sign another 2 year contract with Tmobile. When I got the phone I was excited to start using it becuase the reviews I had read online made it seem like this little phone was capable of doing mulitiple functions, but to my suprise it didn't. It is a great little phone to call and text and get online with, but thats about it. If your looking for something like the Iphone or blackberry (which I'm looking to buy now) this phone probably isn't what you want.

Reviews.Title: LG GS500 Cookie Plus Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Cell P...
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Received my low budget LG GS500 PLUS Cookie adaptation full touch screen experience phone 4 days ago and it is working fine. When you look at the price of it. It is really not bad for a phone that costs only $119.99 and has a Responsive Touch Screen and a very user friendly interface.

Reviews.Title: really nice phone
Reviews.Author: tasha
Reviews.Content: well i really like the phone, it was very easy to use, but still had a lot of really cool features that something like a smartphone would have. im not really into all the apps and things like that, so this phones really good for that. it has just the right amount of technology for me. the only thing is, it wont send or receive picture messages. i called t-mobile and they said there is nothing they can do because the phone is not through the company. so that is the only thing that i am really unhappy about. but other than that, it is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: samuel mundell
Reviews.Content: this phone works very well in my country . i tried sim card from all of my network here and it works very good.the only negative i have about this phone is that the manual is not in english so i have to figure out the features on my own which can be very time consuming,over all i would recommend this phone ,battery life is also good

Reviews.Title: Almost works on everything
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: The GS500 I have is very good with t-mobile for text and voice.  In US use the prepaid and added the internet.  Had to go to a 3rd party website to setup internet on the phone.  All works except downloading videos from US web.  I think it is a good buy, light, thin, attractive, and has great reception everywhere I go.  Loads google maps quickly and shows traffic.  Runs most apps not iphone or other carrier specific.  Took time learning all the buttons(top to turn off screen) camera is great, good pics.  Will find how to do videos eventually.  Used Safaricom sim for Kenya along with t-mobile germany sim.  Get pouch to put any phone like this in(camera pouches are least $).  Long battery life.  I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Phone From This Vendor
Reviews.Author: Kenneth M. Chapman "Ken Chapman"
Reviews.Content: The LG GS500 appears to be a delightful product.Based upon the vendors claims I bought the phone.  I travel the world and need an unlocked mobile, so at anytime I can slip in a SIM card and I am in business.The phone was made for the UK market.  LG USA does not provide warranty service for this mobile.The phone delivered to me is still locked.  The mobile came in "Koodo Mobile" box (the Telco Vendor).  The box had no wrapping on it, and the seal was clearly broken.  I am guessing someone opened it up, tried to unlock it, didn't test it, and put it back in the box to be sold to some unsuspecting sucker like me.It powers up with a greeting screen from Koodo Mobile, and locks me out of changing virtually all settings, as the Koodo provided software is still on the phone.The vendor should have warned it was made in the UK and not eligible for warranty in the USA.  The vendor also should not have claimed it is unlocked when it is not.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CELL PHONE
Reviews.Author: JAY
Reviews.Content: AS A NEW USER OF CELL PHONES SINCE THE FIRST CAR CELL PHONES CAMEOUT YEARS AGO, THIS CELL PHONE IS EASY TO USE AND PROGRAM.I USE AT&T; AND HAD NO PROBLEM GETTING IT TO WORK RIGHT OFF THE BAT..ADDED FEATURES ARE FONT SIZE CAN BE CHANGED AND GAMES LOADED..EASY TOUCH SCREEN..NO AUTO FOCUS ON CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Nice Entry Level Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Vector Picasso
Reviews.Content: This is a good option for people looking to step into the smartphone world without dishing out several hundred dollars on contracts/phones. I joined the Walmart Family Plan with it and it works just fine. I would consider it an entry level smartphone and for that it fits the bill. You may want to keep a spare charger at work or in the car as the battery life isn't spectacular.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS GOOD & ITS UNLOCKED AS THEY SAY!!!
Reviews.Author: KENYON
Reviews.Content: IT WORKS GREAT THE ONLY PROBLEM I SEEM TO HAVE IS TO GET ONLINE & THE APPS MAYBE I JUST NEED TO MESS WITH IT SOME MORE BUT IT TAKES GREAT PICS & I MEAN GREAT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Luis Lara
Reviews.Content: This product is so good because the touch is very sensible. good design and have a lot of aplications. I recomended it

Reviews.Title: Apparently NOT for T-Mobile
Reviews.Author: The tinkerer
Reviews.Content: While this GS500 is 3G capable, as opposed to the KP500, it isn't listed as 1700/2100 duel band capable in addition to its quad band frequencies. If that's so, it won't work with T-Mobile 3G. The T-Mobile version of this phone is the Sentio.It could be that the specs are just badly quoted here on Amazon - anybody using this for T-Mobile 3G?

Reviews.Title: Poor quality or defective (screen smudge)
Reviews.Author: MT Miami
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product in August and within 2 months the screen developed a smudge internally. I contacted BLUTEKUSA and their response was a single line: I sincerely apologize but Amazon and us have a 30 day return policy. I tried contacting LG and they said it is not a US product so they are not liable and I need to go to an international website which I tried and could not get any contacts or support.I would avoid buying it.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable phone.
Reviews.Author: Humberto Boscán
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone. It's not a smart one but It supplies the basic performance and will satisfy the average consumer

Reviews.Title: Terrible, terrible phone
Reviews.Author: AW
Reviews.Content: Within 3 months of using this phone, a little black dot appeared in the lower center of the screen, and it only got bigger over time. Over the course of 1 year, my screen had one big dot and one line over it. I actually could live with that, since I mostly use it for texting and calling  anyway, but eventually (a little over 1 year), the phone stopped getting reception altogether. Yes, no reception no matter where I went. I had some luck at first restarting the phone, but after a while, the phone just plainly refused to get any signal. I tried putting my sim card in another phone, and it worked perfectly.TL;DR: Terrible phone. Screen display & reception problems.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Marina H.
Reviews.Content: I only got it because I thought I didn't have a free replacement for my broken phone.Is not a bad phone but being used to higher technologies I would recommend this phone for a firdt timer.

Reviews.Title: Ok phone
Reviews.Author: Hernany
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because I didn't want to have to sign another 2 year contract with Tmobile. When I got the phone I was excited to start using it becuase the reviews I had read online made it seem like this little phone was capable of doing mulitiple functions, but to my suprise it didn't. It is a great little phone to call and text and get online with, but thats about it. If your looking for something like the Iphone or blackberry (which I'm looking to buy now) this phone probably isn't what you want.

Reviews.Title: no spanish
Reviews.Author: fernando rodriguez
Reviews.Content: this celular does not have the spanish option i have to pay more to change the lenguage i am disapointed

Reviews.Title: Bought the phone for Mother-n-law
Reviews.Author: RAD
Reviews.Content: My mother-n-law wanted a newer looking phone without paying for a smartphone. This one is user friendly and she likes the way it looks.

Reviews.Title: This phone is really for kids - not adults
Reviews.Author: craig davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for the Bluetooth capability. After getting it set up, Its obvious that its for kids (little stick figures with hearts floating over them??) If I would have know this, I would have chosen a different product

Reviews.Title: Consistently Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Felix A. Owolabi
Reviews.Content: It worked for only few day and began to go blur, and trouble shoot several time by my carrier before I dropped using it.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Burroughs
Reviews.Content: Great phone at a good price. T mobile my carrier hook up the browser no problem. Very HAPPY! Will use again when needed.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great price.
Reviews.Author: Jose G. Balboa
Reviews.Content: I have already purchased four of these phones, they came from Canada (Telus), but work great in California with T-Mobile.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Kamal
Reviews.Content: I bough this phone to send to  Sri Lanka. Initially I thought this is not working in Sri Lanka. But it work and it is good phone with Camera.

Reviews.Title: seemed like a cheap version of the orginal
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Phone did not have multiple languages. Phone did not have built in stylus. Phone screen was unresponsive in certain areas.It appeared to be a cheap version of the original cookie.

Reviews.Title: Cheap temporary phone.
Reviews.Author: itssundae
Reviews.Content: I have been using this phone for three months now and felt that I am able to post my final opinions on this phone.Pros: light phone for normal uses, battery life.Cons: the lag, dead pixels, picture messaging is bad.Given the low price of the phone, I already expected this. It's great for a cheap temporary phone, not a long term one.

Reviews.Title: Good service from Amazon and the seller
Reviews.Author: zanita
Reviews.Content: I order this phone and it is how was advertised, I am happy with it, it came with USB cable, headphones, pen and work very well with my sim card from T-Mobil.The only problem is the internet access, I have to update my internet plan.They delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: Kelvin
Reviews.Content: This is a great touch-screen phone for the price. This isn't a smart phone, and takes a little bit of programming in order to use the internet and MMS - but you can just do an online search for your provider's network and multimedia message settings (or give them a call).  It works great with AT&T; and T-mobile (from what i've tested).  The only reason I give it a 4 out of 5 is because sometimes I hear an echo when I'm speaking - but this really isn't an issue.

Reviews.Title: A good phone.
Reviews.Author: Snipe
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this phone to any huge texters. This phone has a pressure touchscreen instead of heat which means some unresponsiveness especially when trying to text quickly. Otherwise its a great phone and fun to play around with. I do feel its a little slow at times but not a huge deal.

Reviews.Title: more than i expected
Reviews.Author: cujo
Reviews.Content: This phone has a lot of features,more than i expected.I love it and would recomend it to anyone,great phone, great price and quality!

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: GILBERT OFORI
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED THE CELL PHONE A FEW DAYS AFTER I MADE THE ORDER AND IT CAME WITH ALL THE ACCESORIES AS IT WAS ADVERTISED.I RECEIVED THE PHONE EVEN BEFORE THE ACTUAL DELIVERY DATE AND EVERYTHING WAS IN GOOD CONDITION AND NEW.THANKS

Reviews.Title: Useless Korean Made Phone
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: PLEASE , DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE IF YOU ARE ON AT&T.; This phone is cute but useless on an AT&T; network, you can't use the internet of Media Net from AT&T;, text any picture messages or anything that uses the web. AT&T; will not be able to help you and LG USA is about as helpful as a blind man giving you driving lessons.  Do Not Buy !!!

Reviews.Title: Good Signal, Bad Screen
Reviews.Author: 2189E
Reviews.Content: I'm using this phone two years now.The Screen - The screen gave me trouble the first month.If you receive a message and you don't read it immediately .. The screen freezes. You have to turn it off to recover the functionality.  Texting is a nightmare because the screen sometimes doesn't respond.6 months ago I thought the screen died.  It started to blink and move by itself. It was impossible to make a call.  I was using another phone and suddenly I tested and worked again.Now I have the same problem.... The telephone is officially retired.The signal - I was able to use the phone in 3 countries (Europe/Latinamerica) without a problem.  It will work with simplemobile.  The signal strength is powerful.  Beware that you can feel the radiation, so use earphones to protect yourself.I used the phone very gently.Text messages, calls, mp3, basic internet (google search), take pictures. If the screen would have a better quality this would be a keeper.

Reviews.Title: the phone is defective
Reviews.Author: atgs01
Reviews.Content: I've received the phone and tried to set it up.  The phone look nice, thin and slim.  However, the phone is constantly frozen up on me.  I can't do anything, can't touch the screen, can't turn off, can't return to the previous menu.  Basically, I can't do anything.  I have to take the battery out in order to turn it off, and put the battery back in then restart it.  At one point, I took the battery out, but the charger was still connected to the phone; so the screen was still on though it was frozen up.  It got frozen up almost every half hour.  Frustrated!!

Reviews.Title: mobile LG COOKIE PLUS  GS500 problems
Reviews.Author: ney sanz
Reviews.Content: Dear Sirs the mobile phone they sent me has problems with the internet connection, my telephone company reported no way to do the liaison to the intenet. I need to advise me to do, since the phone has warranty. I await your prompt response to the problem. greetings. Ney Sanz

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: "J_Strife"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife, it's design if very good and feels very confortable on hand, my wife loves it!

Reviews.Title: bad expierience
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Phone would not work properly and the sellers customer service is full of promises that they never keep.other then that ok.

Reviews.Title: help!
Reviews.Author: claire111
Reviews.Content: I want to get this but I have t mobile & live in Michigan so would this work ? Because it says it an International Version? ?

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: David Levy
Reviews.Content: LG GS500 Cookie Plus Unlocked Quad-Band Cell Phone with 3 MP Camera...LGHow do you rate this product?LG GS500 Cookie Plus Unlocked Quad-Band Cell Phone with 3 MP Camera...LGHow do you rate this product?

Reviews.Title: Please do not get this
Reviews.Author: vishnu reddy
Reviews.Content: Fingers hurt trying to operate this phone, it's not at all user friendly, you can get much better phones far cheaper than this.

Reviews.Title: Can't Connect to Internet in USA
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: While this is a very nice and attractive phone, when I tried to download a ringtone from my AT&T; network, I discovered that this phone is not supported in the USA. AT&T; did try diligently to help me, but was unsuccessful. After chatting with LG USA, I was told that this particular phone is not made in the US and not supported here. He helpfully gave me the website for global LG. I checked my phone and discovered it was made in Korea. Sadly, Korea was not a country on the link I was provided. Went back to Live Chat with LG and was given a direct link to their Korean site. Well not surprisingly, the website was in Korean. Since I don't speak the language and did not want to spend the money to call Korea (with the phone number that LG helpfully provided), and since I was certain to get someone speaking in a language unfamiliar to me if I did call, I guess my only option will be to return this very nice but useless phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone looks good in picture but that's about it
Reviews.Author: Jeanie
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this phone it's so lame! it looks really cool in the picture and then you get it in person and say to yourself....I paid 80 bucks for this? *facepalm*

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad Band 850/900/1800/1900, HSDPA 2100
Display: TFT resistive touch screen, 256K colors, 240 x 400 pixels, 3.0 inches, Flash UI, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Handwriting recognition
Camera: 3.15 MP, 2048x1536 pixels, Video QVGA 12fps. Stereo FM radio with RDS. MP3/WMA/AAC player. MP4/H.263 player. Organizer. Document viewer
Talk Time: Up to 3 h 40 min, Stand by Time: Up to 400 h
Display: TFT resistive touchscreen, 256K colors, 240 x 400 pixels, 3.0 inches, Flash UI, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Handwriting recognition
ProductInfo.Name: LG GS500 Cookie Plus Unlocked Quad-Band Cell Phone with 3 MP Camera, Touchscreen, Bluetooth, MicroSD Memory Card Slot - International Version - Black
